description: Lists all bill estimates for the account.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Filters to apply to the list of bill estimates. (dict) --- Represents a filter for listing bill estimates. The name of the filter attribute. The values to filter by. (string) --- matchOption (string) --- The match option for the filter (e.g., equals, contains).

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter attribute.

nested_params.name: matchOption
nested_params.description: The match option for the filter (e.g., equals, contains).

parameters.name: createdAtFilter
parameters.description: Filter bill estimates based on the creation date. afterTimestamp (datetime) --- Include results after this timestamp. beforeTimestamp (datetime) --- Include results before this timestamp.

parameters.name: expiresAtFilter
parameters.description: Filter bill estimates based on the expiration date. afterTimestamp (datetime) --- Include results after this timestamp. beforeTimestamp (datetime) --- Include results before this timestamp.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The list of bill estimates for the account.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bill estimate.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the bill estimate.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the bill estimate.

nested_items.name: billInterval
nested_items.description: The time period covered by the bill estimate.

nested_items.name: start
nested_items.description: The start date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: end
nested_items.description: The end date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the bill estimate was created.

nested_items.name: expiresAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the bill estimate will expire.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token to retrieve the next page of results, if any.
